mapper.insert: insert into option_list (option_code, option_name, option_var, us_code, us_name, exe_type, strike_price, strike_month, call_put, first_tradedate, last_tradedate, change_percent, amount, pre_settle, open_price, highest, lowest, close_price, settlement_price, volume, position_vol, up_limit_price, down_limit_price, delta, gamma, vega, theta, rho, in_value, time_value, update_time, valid) VALUES
